content.query:
CREATE VIEW [reporting].[dim_orders]
	AS 
	SELECT 
	sh.Sales_Order_ID, sh.Order_Date, sh.Due_Date, sh.Sales_Order_Number,sh.Ship_date, sh.Customer_ID, sh.Ship_to_Address_ID,
	sh.Bill_To_Address_ID, sh.Purchase_Order_Number, sh.Account_Number,sh.Ship_Method, sh.Tax_Amt, sh.Freight, sh.Sub_Total, sh.Total_Due
	from
	[dbo].[salesOrderHeader] sh
